text_block_list.text:
("Ligne Droite". Better known as "Dorowa". 
A ball that the students organize just before the 
sakura trees bloom and usher in a new semester.)
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
(It's a special day where Umamusume dance upon a gorgeous 
stage set up in the gym with their one and only date for the night.)
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
(Back then, I only ever saw that dazzling stage 
from up above in the audience. But that day…)
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: (I was entranced by her elegant form swept up in a dance.)
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Woah…
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
(A couple dance is a work of art that two people make 
together. If one person is going to be in the spotlight, 
the other has to support them.)
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
(But Maruzen-san and Rudolf-san were both the main characters 
of that dance. I couldn't take my eyes off either of them. 
They were so strong, so beautiful…)
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: (That night, I'm sure everyone else thought the same. This is what it means to be special. …How could anyone not long for that?)
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
(In the Ligne Droite, the title of "Best Date" is awarded 
to whichever pair's dance attracts the most attention.)
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
(Maruzen-san and Rudolf-san were awarded the crown, 
lauded in applause and praise. At that moment, 
they shone brighter than anyone.)
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
(I was just watching from the audience, but I felt my heart racing… 
I thought, "next time, it'll be me who wears that crown!")
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
(I want to win the "Best Date" title, just like those two did. 
The peak that everyone aspires to will be mine!)
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: After that, time passed in a flash…
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Hah… hah…
text_block_list.name: Chiyono O & Ardan

text_block_list.text:
Yaaaaaaah! 
Uraaaaaah!
text_block_list.name: Chiyono O & Ardan

text_block_list.text: Hah… whew… hehe. You're as strong as ever, Chiyono O-san.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
You too, Ardan-san! It's the first time in a while we've 
gotten to partner run since our debuts… I got kinda nervous!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
Plus, we don't get the chance to race together, either. 
…Hehe, if only we'd invited Yaeno-san along too, 
since we're both out here.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
But she said she was busy racing Oguri-san 
for the chance to win a date.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: A date…? Oh, for Dorowa. There's no helping that, I suppose.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
For us, Dorowa isn't just the end of one season and the 
beginning of another. It's also a place to find where our 
feelings for one another start and end.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: Precious friends, longtime rivals, somebody you long to be like… it's a rare chance to invite them to be your "date" for the night.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
That's right! It's a special time for Umamusume linked 
together by unique feelings to spend together. And…
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: (It's a night where only one pair can be chosen as the "Best Date".)
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
(It's more than just making memories. If I long for the 
crown of "Best Date", then I have to dance like 
Maruzen-san did with Rudolf-san…)
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: (I need someone who'll steal the spotlight together with me. Someone who's like a rival to me.)
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Um, Chiyono O-san…?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: A-Ardan-san! If your hands are free, then would you take mine in yours?!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: I want to aim for the title of Best Date at Dorowa! I want you to be my date as my rival, so… may I have this dansh?!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: My…!
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: Of course. I accept. I would also love to dance with you.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: Woah…! For real? Like, for real for real?! Then…
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Hey, sorry to interrupt your flirting. Did I just hear that you two are going to Dorowa together?
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: Huwah?! Nature-san?
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: That's me. Dorowa executive committee member Nice Nature, at your service. Could I trouble you to fill out this questionnaire about your dresses?
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: I'm sure you both know, but we have a dress code, you see. We'd like for you to come dressed super sparkly and stylish for the day, of course…
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: But participants have the choice of bringing their own dresses or borrowing from us. Will you two be preparing your own dresses?
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: Oh, right… hmm… dresses, huh… It'd be nice to stand out from everyone else and wear my own dress, but I don't own one, so…
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Oh, is that so? I understand. As such… Nature-san, we won't be needing to borrow any dresses.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: They say to strike while the iron is hot, do they not? Come, Chiyono O-san, let us prepare.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: Is the dress fit to your liking, miss? It's just a basting stitch, so if there are any tight spots, just say the word.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Family Designer

text_block_list.text: A-Ah, no, it's a super-duper-ooper perfect fit…!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: (It's a soft and mellow light pink, kind of like sakura petals. Battling against the cold, they eventually open up to blossom. No matter the hardship, they'll overcome it…)
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Um, actually, is it okay for me to wear this?! I know it's a lot of work for you all of the Mejiro family to make a dress for me like this.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: You're my date, Chiyono O-san. It is but a matter of course to be of service.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: Oh, so pretty! Ardan-san, what's that you're wearing?
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: This is a tailcoat I had tailored some time ago. See, the theme of your dress for this occasion is "sakura petals", so I decided to go with the theme of "snow" and a white tailcoat to match.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: So, like… snow on sakura petals?
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Indeed. What do you think?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: U-Um…!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: I… I think it's beautiful.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: And so, Mejiro Ardan-san and I decided to aim for the title of Best Date.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
